for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    d = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = ''
    for i in d:
        ans += str(int(i % k == 0))
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, K) = map(int, input().split())
    lst = list(map(int, input().split()))
    res = ['1' if i % K == 0 else '0' for i in lst]
    print(''.join(res))

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, K) = map(int, input().split())
    D = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = ''
    for i in D:
        s = s + str(int(bool(not i % K)))
    print(s)
